What is Sponge Applicators?
Sponge applicators are sterile sponges attached to handles, used to apply antiseptic solution to the skin. They are commonly used to apply antiseptic solution to puncture sites for disinfection.
I just start,what should I do first?

As you just started, the first thing you should do is to open the tray in a sterile fashion. Ensure you open it carefully to avoid contaminating any of the contents inside. Peel back the packaging, making sure to open it in an area that allows for creating a sterile field. Remember to only touch the very edges and corners of the paper wrapping, not the middle, to prevent contamination. Be cautious as you open the last part, making sure not to touch the contents.
